name: Dolce
description:
Just as the last day before winter break ends... it starts again?! Features:
  • time loop that can go on forever if you don't do anything (not recommended)
  • two CGs
  • teachers committing crimes being super professional
  • nightly writing game(?)
  • one estranged childhood friend
  • lots of ThoughtsTM and ellipsis...

The total game time is probably around an hour or so and it's around 13k words :>

But if you go looking for every possible event then... probably longer? LMAO

If you need help and find yourself stuck in the loop (haha) there is a cheatsheet included in the game files that should be able to help you :D

If you find any bugs, please let me know by DMing my twitter @no_xiruo!! (link is above, im lazy lmao)

Also this VN was made in 3 weeks after many sleepless nights, so if you spot typos and stuff... yeah.
